metadata.subtitle: Find Your Perfect Afghan Match
metadata.description:
Aroosi is the premier matrimonial platform connecting Afghan singles worldwide. Built with cultural values and modern technology, find your perfect life partner through our secure, respectful, and family-oriented community.

metadata.keywords: Afghan, matrimony, marriage, matchmaking, dating, relationships, Afghan singles, Muslim dating, cultural values, traditional marriage, family-oriented, authentic profiles, secure platform

rationale: The app contains mature themes related to dating and relationships. Users must be 18+ to create profiles.
features: Push notifications for matches and messages

en.description: Unlock unlimited messaging, see who viewed your profile, and get priority support.
All Premium features plus incognito browsing, unlimited boosts, and advanced matching.

reviewNotes: This app is designed for the Afghan community worldwide to find marriage partners in a respectful, family-oriented environment. All profiles are moderated for authenticity. The app includes premium subscription features for enhanced functionality. Users must be 18+ and provide valid identification during registration.
